data.title: The name of the Indian Astronomer (who knew five astronomical systems), who lived in the 6th century was
data.meta_description: Click here:point_up_2:to get an answer to your question :writing_hand:the name of the indian astronomer who knew five astronomical systems who lived in the
data.text:
Solution

Verified by Toppr

Varahamihira was an Indian astronomer belonging to the sixth century. He wrote Brihat Samhita which is an encyclopedia of astronomy, physical geography, botany, and natural history. his other works are Panch Siddhantika and Brihad Jataka.
